description: Epic cross country trail with fast, flowy, and smooth sections, good climbs and technical descents. Fantastic views of the Toby Creek Canyon, Rocky Mountains, and the District of Invermere.  Note exercise caution along the exposed, Toby creek Canyon.New for 2012 is a well marked connector that links The Kloosifer with The Johnson to double your canyon riding pleasure.
directions: The Trailhead is located off Toby Creek road at the intersection with Clover Rd.  Head up the Toby Creek Rd from Invermere toward Panorama, after the steep climb, look for Clover Road on your left and turn off of Toby Creek Road onto the dirt road on your left, drive a few hundred meters and here you will find parking and a washroom (new for 2012).
title: The Kloosifier
